My name is Regina Pilipchuk, a full-stack web developer. Contact me to design an efficient and creative solution for your development needs.

Hi, I’m Regina —

A full-stack web developer passionate about front-end development and user experience. I strive to bridge the gap between people and data:

I don’t just build apps and websites — I create solutions, tools, and satisfying experiences.

Experience

I bring you half a decade of experience in the administrative field where I learned to be methodical, organized, and a strong communicator. As an administrative professional, I worked on teams to satisfy clients, increase workflow efficiency, and manage projects and events.

The skills I have as an administrative professional now help me, a full-stack web developer, solve technical problems and develop unique web solutions, whether that's working as a freelancer for a client or on a development team to build or maintain applications.

Projects

Let's Connect

My passion for beautiful and functional design drives me to create stunning user interfaces.

My expertise in organizing data enables me to build structured and organized back-end systems.

My strength lies in connecting the two: I strive to make data come to life by analyzing data, structuring it, and giving it an interface that makes it usable.
